note:
Not the kind of doctor you might want at 30,000 feet. Or the kind of chemist you'd trust to give you the right tablets. Old, Curmudgeonly, Bear-Shaped and Welsh. And somewhat dyspraxic.

I run the #chem4word project in my spare time.

AKA 'Scope'

name: Background
value: Originally a chemist, but drifted into informatics and then information technology. Now work for a university.

name: Interests
value: Being snobbish about the Welsh coastline, scientific informatics, science, nature, walking, food, classical music, film, good books, gardens and my adorable choccie Labrador.

name: Projects
value: https://chem4word.co.uk
